features: Elevate Intimate Life with Our Vaginal Moisturizers Capsules - Our vaginal dryness capsules are made up of a special blend of natural ingredients: slippery elm bark inside a QuickDissolve hypromellose capsule. Our vaginal dryness supplements are a great alternative to sticky vaginal dryness cream.

Don't accept pain and discomfort - just because things are changing. Our She Juicy vagina moisturizer helps alleviate vaginal dryness. For oral use - not a vaginal dryness cream or vaginal suppository.

Dermatologist and Gynecologist Recommended - She Juicy helps reactivate and rejuvenate vaginal lining. And unlike lubes and other vaginial moisturizing creams, She Juicy creates no ‘mess’ and lets enjoy without needing external lubrication.

Cruelty-Free and Non-Irritating: SheJuicy vaginial moisturizing supplement is completely free of dyes, fragrances, soy, steroids, synthetic preservatives, petroleum, parabens, etc. that most ladies are allergic to. Quickly and easily get vaginal dryness relief.

A Female Dryness Cure - Confidence - Don’t have to give up just because stress, menopause, or medication-related side effects. Our vaginal dryness treatment pill helps prevent the thinning of the mucosal membranes while supporting the vaginal lining for optimal vaginal moisturizing. Great alternative to yoni oil.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the main ingredient in "She Juicy" and what does it do? "She Juicy" contains an optimal dose of Slippery Elm Bark, naturally abundant in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds. These elements collectively support your vajayjay's mucosa, the juicy component that helps things get nice-n-slippery. How do I use "She Juicy"? "She Juicy" is an oral supplement, not a suppository. You take it as you would any other oral capsule. Please follow the instructions on the packaging for the recommended dosage. Is "She Juicy" vegan-friendly? Yes, "She Juicy" contains natural products and is vegan. Is "She Juicy" safe to use? "She Juicy" is made from natural ingredients and is dermatologist and gynecologist recommended. However, as with any supplement, you should always check with your physician before starting a new regimen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Product works very well. I can tell they have amazing customer service as well since I also received a hand written thank you card and a sample of the boric acid, which I have use once and it also works well. Thank you so much. Amazing Product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flower Power (Women's supplements
reviews.reviewText: This product works quickly, on the 2nd day lubrication was definitely evident. The ingredient in the supplement works exactly as stated on the bottle. Ladies, you might want to wear mini pads with this product👌I got I'm not being too graphic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I don’t think it works
reviews.reviewText: Been taking since Feb 2nd 3 times a day with about 3 liters of water a day. Today is Feb 4th and I honestly think it made me drier. I have no issues with vaginal dryness I just wanted to try it out and usually I can feel myself getting wet down there throughout the day. after taking this, nothing all day and I expected more. Maybe it’s because I am currently on my period but unsure. I will keep trying them for the rest of the week to make sure since my period is almost over. I will say it has helped tremendously with making bowel movements easier because of the lubricant it helps my body produce but that’s all. I have also noticed that even while drinking all that water last few days, I’ve barely gone to the bathroom to pee as much as I would’ve if I had not been taking these pills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is some good stuff 🎉 you must drink plenty of water and you WON’T be disappointed 🥰 I noticed the difference after week 2 and I’m not finished the bottle of pills yet 🫶🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They worked for me!
reviews.reviewText: Took these as directed with probiotic pills. He said SHE taste GREAT and SHE good & wet..😍💃🏿

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ima just say this “THE BOMB”
reviews.reviewText: As a first time user this product is amazingggg!!!Following the directions and I noticed a major difference the first day taking the pills😍I LOVEEE IT it definitely gets the job done P.S the pills are big so just be mindful when swallowing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars IT GIVES ME LOOOOOTS OF GAS!
reviews.reviewText: This product so far gives me lots of gas, I am so bloated and very uncomfortable. I take prebiotic in the morning and take it with food in the afternoon. I haven't seen any results yet , it might be too soon but it's been over a week since I've been taking so I cannot say that it doesn't work! I will keep going, it hasn't killed me yet! Also my husband ask if I was taking something cause he could taste it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really love the result of the product. It works perfectly as it is said including drinking a large glass of water with the product. I will greatly recommend. I did not take it regularly, I skip some days but it still works great.
